sect2.title: Filmrolls
sect2.para: The basic element for organizing images in darktable is called a filmroll - a kind of virtual folder. Whenever you import images from disk, the images are organized in a filmroll whose name is derived from the name of the disk folder. Re-importing a disk folder will add any new images to the existing filmroll; images already present in the filmroll are not touched.
It is important to note that importing images in darktable does not involve a physical copy step. Importing a folder into darktable is therefore not a backup operation of that folder.
